data.meta_description: I composed and arranged the original music for all the 4 episodes of "Una Storia Chiamata GOMORRA La Serie" on Sky Atlantic and HBO Max. Directed by Marco Pianigiani, edited by Massimiliano Feresin and Florio Sampieri, written by Fred Chiarini and Alessia Colombo.I composed and arranged original music for Gambero Rosso channel for: In Itinere, Lombardia On The Road 1 & 2, Cantine Lizzano and the soundtrack of all the 6 episodes of La Mia Sardegna documentary, directed by Gian Paolo Damato and edited by Massimiliano Feresin. Also season 2. http://sky.it
data.text:
Sky Italia

I composed and arranged the original music for all the 4 episodes of "Una Storia Chiamata GOMORRA La Serie" on Sky Atlantic and HBO Max. Directed by Marco Pianigiani, edited by Massimiliano Feresin and Florio Sampieri, written by Fred Chiarini and Alessia Colombo.I composed and arranged original music for Gambero Rosso channel for: In Itinere, Lombardia On The Road 1 & 2, Cantine Lizzano and the soundtrack of all the 6 episodes of La Mia Sardegna documentary, directed by Gian Paolo Damato and edited by Massimiliano Feresin. Also season 2.
